channel.description: Recent content in financial services on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 N26 Bank Logo
N26 (known as Number 26 until July 2016) is a German direct bank, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. N26 offers its services throughout most of the Eurozone, UK, Switzerland and US. It is expected to start operating in Brazil soon. Source
You can download theN26logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: N26
item.description: N26 (known as Number 26 until July 2016) is a German direct bank, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. N26 offers its services throughout most of the Eurozone, UK, Switzerland and US. It is expected to start operating in Brazil soon. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Nippon Life Insurance Company Logo
Nippon Life Insurance Company is the largest Japanese life insurance company by revenue. The company was founded in 1889 as the Nippon Life Assurance Co., Inc. In structure it is a mutual company. It first paid policyholder dividends in 1898. Source Source
You can download theNissaylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Nissay
item.description: Nippon Life Insurance Company is the largest Japanese life insurance company by revenue. The company was founded in 1889 as the Nippon Life Assurance Co., Inc. In structure it is a mutual company. It first paid policyholder dividends in 1898. Source Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Allianz Group Logo
Allianz SE is a German multinational financial services company headquartered in Munich, Germany. Its core businesses are insurance and asset management. As of 2014, it is the world’s largest insurance company, the largest financial services group and the largest company according to a composite measure by Forbes magazine, as well as the largest financial services company when measured by 2013 revenue. The company is a component of the Euro Stoxx 50 stock market index.
You can download theAllianzlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Allianz
item.description: Allianz SE is a German multinational financial services company headquartered in Munich, Germany. Its core businesses are insurance and asset management. As of 2014, it is the world’s largest insurance company, the largest financial services group and the largest company according to a composite measure by Forbes magazine, as well as the largest financial services company when measured by 2013 revenue. The company is a component of the Euro Stoxx 50 stock market index.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bain Capital Logo
Bain Capital is a private investment firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. It specializes in private equity, venture capital, credit, public equity, impact investing, life sciences and real estate. Bain Capital invests across a range of industry sectors and geographic regions. As of 2018, the firm managed more than $105 billion of investor capital. Source Source
You can download theBain Capitallogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Bain Capital
item.description: Bain Capital is a private investment firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. It specializes in private equity, venture capital, credit, public equity, impact investing, life sciences and real estate. Bain Capital invests across a range of industry sectors and geographic regions. As of 2018, the firm managed more than $105 billion of investor capital. Source Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. Logo
The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., is an American multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in New York City. It offers services in investment management, securities, asset management, prime brokerage, and securities underwriting. Source
You can download theGoldman Sachslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Goldman Sachs
item.description: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., is an American multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in New York City. It offers services in investment management, securities, asset management, prime brokerage, and securities underwriting. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 PayPal Holdings Logo
PayPal Holdings, Inc. is an American company operating a worldwide online payments system that supports online money transfers and serves as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders. The company operates as a payment processor for online vendors, auction sites, and many other commercial users, for which it charges a fee in exchange for benefits such as one-click transactions and password memory. PayPal’s payment system, also called PayPal, is considered a type of payment rail.
You can download thePayPallogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: PayPal
item.description: PayPal Holdings, Inc. is an American company operating a worldwide online payments system that supports online money transfers and serves as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders. The company operates as a payment processor for online vendors, auction sites, and many other commercial users, for which it charges a fee in exchange for benefits such as one-click transactions and password memory. PayPal’s payment system, also called PayPal, is considered a type of payment rail.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 The Principal Financial Group Logo
The Principal Financial Group is a global financial investment management and insurance company headquartered in Des Moines, Iowa Source Enter Lippincott, who, through leadership workshops, gained clarity on the vision and business objectives. Principal then conducted a global study of 1,200 employees to mine for perceived strengths and desired shifts in the brand evolution. Whether by geography, business unit or tenure, employees were calling for a strong signal about and recognition of the company’s next era — one that was already global, bolder, more collaborative, and more humanly and intellectually inclusive than ever before.
You can download thePrincipallogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Principal
item.description: The Principal Financial Group is a global financial investment management and insurance company headquartered in Des Moines, Iowa Source Enter Lippincott, who, through leadership workshops, gained clarity on the vision and business objectives. Principal then conducted a global study of 1,200 employees to mine for perceived strengths and desired shifts in the brand evolution. Whether by geography, business unit or tenure, employees were calling for a strong signal about and recognition of the company’s next era — one that was already global, bolder, more collaborative, and more humanly and intellectually inclusive than ever before.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Visa Logo
Visa Inc. is an American multinational financial services corporation headquartered in Foster City, California, United States. It facilitates electronic funds transfers throughout the world, most commonly through Visa-branded credit cards, debit cards and prepaid cards. Visa is one of the world’s most valuable companies. Visa does not issue cards, extend credit or set rates and fees for consumers; rather, Visa provides financial institutions with Visa-branded payment products that they then use to offer credit, debit, prepaid and cash access programs to their customers.
You can download theVisalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Visa
item.description: Visa Inc. is an American multinational financial services corporation headquartered in Foster City, California, United States. It facilitates electronic funds transfers throughout the world, most commonly through Visa-branded credit cards, debit cards and prepaid cards. Visa is one of the world’s most valuable companies. Visa does not issue cards, extend credit or set rates and fees for consumers; rather, Visa provides financial institutions with Visa-branded payment products that they then use to offer credit, debit, prepaid and cash access programs to their customers.
